_header: Lordings digne and dear / Listen & ye may hear

BLHar3954.First Lines: LOrdyngis dygne an dereLystyn & ȝe may here…
BLHar3954.Last Lines: …Þu ȝyf vs grace to seryun theHere in erthe qwyl we beAmen Amen for charyte
BLHar3954.Note: Preceded by long rubric: Augustinus in liber de ciuitate de vii virtutibus missarum illo die… (f. 76rb).
BLHar3954.Attributed Title: Expliciunt virtutes missarun (rubric below last line, f. 78)
